member.name: T:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.MicroCharts.Palettes.MicroColorSelectionHint
member.summary: Specifies a hint for how a should select colors for a series.

member.name: F:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.MicroCharts.Palettes.MicroColorSelectionHint.Sequential
member.summary: Pick palette colors sequentially. The first series gets the first palette color. The second series gets the second palette color, and so on.

member.name: F:ActiproSoftware.Windows.Controls.MicroCharts.Palettes.MicroColorSelectionHint.UniformDistribution
member.summary: Pick palette colors based on a uniform distribution. If the palette consists of nine base colors and the chart being rendered has three series, the first series gets one of the first three colors in the palette. The second series gets one of the middle three colors in the palette. And the third series gets one of the last three colors in the palette. If there are more series being rendered than base colors in the palette, fallback is to mode.

member.summary: Provides access to the string resources of this assembly, also allowing for their customization.
member.remarks:
Call the method to return a resolved resource string. If a custom string has been set for a specified string resource name, it will be returned. Otherwise, the default string resource value is returned.
If any of the resource strings are customized via a call to , it is best to do so before any other classes in this assembly are referenced, such as in the application startup.
